title: Math Functions
text: There is also a list of math functions available, that allows you to perform mathematical tasks on numbers.

To use them, you must include the math.h
header file in your program:

title: Square Root
text:
To find the square root of a number, use the sqrt() 
function:

title: Round a Number
text: The ceil() function rounds a number upwards to its nearest integer, and the floor()  method rounds a number downwards to its nearest integer, and returns the result:

Example

  printf("%f", ceil(1.4));printf("%f", 
  floor(1.4));

Try it Yourself »

title: Power
text:
The pow() function returns the value of x to the power of
y (xy):
